title: 987 Relationships in Quarantine: Finding Love, and Thriving
description:
On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis lets us peek inside his heart and home, unpacking the last 6 months of a challenging yet deeply rewarding relationship with his girlfriend, Yanet. He describes how they've grown closer and stronger during the quarantine.

The Power of Erotic Intelligence with Esther Perel: https://link.chtbl.com/732-pod

Find Lasting Love with Matthew Hussey: https://link.chtbl.com/811-pod%22
